alert.note: Alert for Archer; Clay (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 24 at 12:41AM CDT until May 24 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Clay County in northern Texas... Northeastern Archer County in northern Texas... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1240 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles southeast of Wichita Falls to 3 miles east of Lake Arrowhead to 7 miles southeast of Windthorst, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Henrietta, Scotland, Windthorst, Bellevue, Jolly, Lake Arrowhead, Bluegrove, Newport, Joy, Vashti, and Shannon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
